PushManagerHasPermission.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The PushManager.hasPermission() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to the PushPermissionStatus of the requesting webapp, which will be one of granted, denied, or default.

blockquote.para: Note: This feature has been superseded by the method.

PushManagerHasPermission.returns: A that resolves to the PushPermissionStatus.
